data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ijuw, Nauru.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ijuw, Nauru
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Ijuw, Nauru a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Ijuw. Through your servants plant 4 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 25 believers in Ijuw to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 175 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ijuw
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ijuw, Ijuw, Nauru.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ijuw, Nauru. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Ijuw, Nauru.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ijuw, Nauru has a population of 200.

We estimate Ijuw has 25 people who might know Jesus, 146 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 29 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Ijuw, Nauru so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
